nodes.text: The EasyRide passenger airspeeder, also known as Coruscant air taxis were repulsorcraft vehicles that operated on the planet Coruscant. They were used to ferry their passengers from one destination to another and were the most common airspeeders to be found in Coruscant's skylanes. Being allowed "free travel," these air taxis were able to leave the auto-navigating skylanes in order to take the most direct means to their destination.
